typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Num Org} as string,
		{Nom Org} as string,
		{Nom DR} as string,
		{Num DR} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ATC (ATC- DR)} as string,
		{ATC (DR-ATC)} as string,
		{Num ATC} as string,
		{Nom ATC} as string,
		Dept as string,
		{Canal Dist} as string,
		{Nom Canal} as string,
		{Flux text} as string,
		HubSAPiD as string,
		{Activité} as string,
		{Nom Activité} as string,
		{Art Niv 1} as string,
		{Nom Niv 1} as string,
		{Art Niv 2} as string,
		{Nom Niv 2} as string,
		{Art Niv 3} as string,
		{Nom Niv 3} as string,
		{Art Niv 4} as string,
		{Nom Niv 4} as string,
		{Art Niv 5} as string,
		{Nom Niv 5} as string,
		{Nom Niv Combiné} as string,
		{PMV An} as string,
		{Qté Obj An} as double,
		{CA Obj An} as string,
		{Qté Mois 01} as string,
		{Qté Mois 02} as string,
		{Qté Mois 03} as string,
		{Qté Mois 04} as string,
		{Qté Mois 05} as string,
		{Qté Mois 06} as string,
		{Qté Mois 07} as string,
		{Qté Mois 08} as string,
		{Qté Mois 09} as string,
		{Qté Mois 10} as string,
		{Qté Mois 11} as string,
		{Qté Mois 12} as string,
		{CA Mois 01} as string,
		{CA Mois 02} as string,
		{CA Mois 03} as string,
		{CA Mois 04} as string,
		{CA Mois 05} as string,
		{CA Mois 06} as string,
		{CA Mois 07} as string,
		{CA Mois 08} as string,
		{CA Mois 09} as string,
		{CA Mois 10} as string,
		{CA Mois 11} as string,
		{CA Mois 12} as string,
		{Qté Trim 1} as string,
		{Qté Trim 2} as string,
		{Qté Trim 3} as string,
		{Qté Trim 4} as string,
		{CA Trim 1} as string,
		{CA Trim 2} as string,
		{CA Trim 3} as string,
		{CA Trim 4} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 01} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 02} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 03} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 04} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 05} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 06} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 07} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 08} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 09} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 10} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 11} as string,
		{Qté Cumul 12} as string,
		{CA Cumul 01} as string,
		{CA Cumul 02} as string,
		{CA Cumul 03} as string,
		{CA Cumul 04} as string,
		{CA Cumul 05} as string,
		{CA Cumul 06} as string,
		{CA Cumul 07} as string,
		{CA Cumul 08} as string,
		{CA Cumul 09} as string,
		{CA Cumul 10} as string,
		{CA Cumul 11} as string,
		{CA Cumul 12} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> objectif
changeNULL select(mapColumn(
		{Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An},
		{Qté Mois 01},
		{Qté Mois 02},
		{Qté Mois 03},
		{Qté Mois 04},
		{Qté Mois 05},
		{Qté Mois 06},
		{Qté Mois 07},
		{Qté Mois 08},
		{Qté Mois 09},
		{Qté Mois 10},
		{Qté Mois 11},
		{Qté Mois 12},
		{CA Mois 01},
		{CA Mois 02},
		{CA Mois 03},
		{CA Mois 04},
		{CA Mois 05},
		{CA Mois 06},
		{CA Mois 07},
		{CA Mois 08},
		{CA Mois 09},
		{CA Mois 10},
		{CA Mois 11},
		{CA Mois 12}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> keepColumns
keepColumns select(mapColumn(
		{Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An},
		{Qté Mois 01},
		{Qté Mois 02},
		{Qté Mois 03},
		{Qté Mois 04},
		{Qté Mois 05},
		{Qté Mois 06},
		{Qté Mois 07},
		{Qté Mois 08},
		{Qté Mois 09},
		{Qté Mois 10},
		{Qté Mois 11},
		{Qté Mois 12}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectQuantity
SelectQuantity unpivot(output(
		columnName as string,
		qt_final as string
	),
	ungroupBy({Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An}),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> quantityToLine
keepColumns select(mapColumn(
		{Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An},
		{CA Mois 01},
		{CA Mois 02},
		{CA Mois 03},
		{CA Mois 04},
		{CA Mois 05},
		{CA Mois 06},
		{CA Mois 07},
		{CA Mois 08},
		{CA Mois 09},
		{CA Mois 10},
		{CA Mois 11},
		{CA Mois 12}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCA
SelectCA unpivot(output(
		columnName as string,
		ca_final as string
	),
	ungroupBy({Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> CAtoLine
quantityToLine derive(Mois = toInteger(split(columnName, " ")[3]),
		qt_final = toDouble(qt_final)) ~> getQuantityMonth
CAtoLine derive(Mois = toInteger(split(columnName, " ")[3]),
		ca_final = toDouble(ca_final)) ~> getCAMonth
getQuantityMonth, getCAMonth join(quantityToLine@{Num Org} == CAtoLine@{Num Org}
	&& quantityToLine@{Num DR} == CAtoLine@{Num DR}
	&& quantityToLine@{Num ATC} == CAtoLine@{Num ATC}
	&& quantityToLine@{Canal Dist} == CAtoLine@{Canal Dist}
	&& quantityToLine@{Nom Canal} == CAtoLine@{Nom Canal}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 1} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 1}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 2} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 2}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 3} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 3}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 4} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 4}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 5} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 5}
	&& getQuantityMonth@Mois == getCAMonth@Mois
	&& quantityToLine@{Qté Obj An} == CAtoLine@{Qté Obj An}
	&& quantityToLine@{CA Obj An} == CAtoLine@{CA Obj An},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinQuantityAndCA
objectif derive({Art Niv 1} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 1}), " ", {Art Niv 1}),
		{Art Niv 2} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 2}), " ", {Art Niv 2}),
		{Art Niv 3} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 3}), " ", {Art Niv 3}),
		{Art Niv 4} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 4}), " ", {Art Niv 4}),
		{Art Niv 5} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 5}), " ", {Art Niv 5})) ~> changeNULL
joinQuantityAndCA select(mapColumn(
		{Num Org} = quantityToLine@{Num Org},
		{Num DR} = quantityToLine@{Num DR},
		{Num ATC} = quantityToLine@{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist} = quantityToLine@{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal} = quantityToLine@{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 5},
		{Qté Obj An} = quantityToLine@{Qté Obj An},
		{CA Obj An} = quantityToLine@{CA Obj An},
		qt_final,
		Mois = getQuantityMonth@Mois,
		ca_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteRightColumn
deleteRightColumn derive({Num Org} = toInteger({Num Org}),
		{Canal Dist} = toInteger({Canal Dist}),
		{Nom Canal} = replace(lower({Nom Canal}), " ", ""),
		{Art Niv 1} = replace({Art Niv 1}, " ", ""),
		{Art Niv 2} = replace({Art Niv 2}, " ", ""),
		{CA Obj An} = toDouble(replace({CA Obj An}, ",", "."))) ~> dataCleansing
dataCleansing sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PREPARATION_OBJECTIF_RH.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output
